filteredArticles.headline: 'More polarized' and 'less informed': Annenberg panel talks impact of declining local news
filteredArticles.abstract: Annenberg professor Victor Pickard led the panel and said corruption has risen in local governments because of the lack of oversight that local news outlets provide.
filteredArticles.infobox:
RELATED: 

Host of ‘You’re Wrong About’ podcast talks how the media misconstrues scandals at KWH

Annenberg study finds social media usage linked to misinformation about vaccines

dominantMedia.title: Victor Pickard Democracy Without Journalism 001.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Annenberg School for Communication professor Victor Pickard led the panel.

filteredArticles.headline: U.S. Education Dept. investigates Harvard and Yale for failing to report foreign donations
filteredArticles.abstract: The Department of Education has sent letters to the two Ivy League universities for failing to report foreign donations of more than $250,000, as required by Section 117 of the Higher Education Act.
filteredArticles.infobox:
RELATED:

Donald Trump pardons fellow Wharton graduate Michael Milken

Yale prof. talks how Russian interference diminishes trust in election results at PWH

dominantMedia.title: harvard yale foreign donations.jpg
dominantMedia.content: The Department of Education has sent letters to Harvard and Yale for failing to disclose foreign donations.
